description: Want to make the most of ripe avocados? Try blitzing them with coriander to make a creamy dressing perfect for salads, tacos or salsas.
keywords: Salad dressing,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Sep 2021,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Coriander & Avocado Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roughly chop stems and leaves of coriander. Process in a food processor with yoghurt, garlic, zest, juice, avocado and 2 tbs water until smooth, adding more water if needed.
